Desc.entry: The school has language college status. Holds evening classes for adults who want to learn new languages or brush up on old ones. Classes run for two terms of 10 weeks. Advanced week classes with intensive conversation groups in French, German, Greek and Spanish, for a maximum of 8 students. Beginners and intermediate classes in French, German, Greek, Italian, Mandarin, Russian and Spanish. Six week holiday language tasters in June and July on Thursdays evenings in Spanish, Italian, Greek and French. All courses are run subject to sufficient demand.
